fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 added 47.55 points or 0.25% to settle at 19,444. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, fell 0.17% to 11.73. HDFC Bank, Reliance Industries (RIL) and ICICI Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The August 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 31 August 2023.
